      • prereqs

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> prereqs()
        Returns the Map object that stores an event's prerequisites. i.e. when all of an event's prerequisites are TRUE: the event can then be listened for by some other function.
        Returns:
        map of prerequisites to events
